description: Application is a definition of Application resource.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

initiatedBy.description: OperationInitiator holds information about the operation initiator

automated.description: Automated is set to true if operation was initiated automatically by the application controller.

username.description: Name of a user who started operation.

retry.description: Retry controls failed sync retry behavior

duration.description: Duration is the amount to back off. Default unit is seconds, but could also be a duration (e.g. "2m", "1h")

factor.description: Factor is a factor to multiply the base duration after each failed retry

maxDuration.description: MaxDuration is the maximum amount of time allowed for the backoff strategy

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of attempts when retrying a container

dryRun.description: DryRun will perform a `kubectl apply --dry-run` without actually performing the sync

manifests.description: Manifests is an optional field that overrides sync source with a local directory for development

prune.description: Prune deletes resources that are no longer tracked in git

resources.description: Resources describes which resources to sync

items.description: SyncOperationResource contains resources to sync.

revision.description: Revision is the revision in which to sync the application to. If omitted, will use the revision specified in app spec.

source.description: Source overrides the source definition set in the application. This is typically set in a Rollback operation and nil during a Sync operation

chart.description: Chart is a Helm chart name

extVars.description: ExtVars is a list of Jsonnet External Variables

items.description: JsonnetVar is a jsonnet variable

tlas.description: TLAS is a list of Jsonnet Top-level Arguments

items.description: JsonnetVar is a jsonnet variable

fileParameters.description: FileParameters are file parameters to the helm template

items.description: HelmFileParameter is a file parameter to a helm template

name.description: Name is the name of the helm parameter

path.description: Path is the path value for the helm parameter

parameters.description: Parameters are parameters to the helm template

items.description: HelmParameter is a parameter to a helm template

forceString.description: ForceString determines whether to tell Helm to interpret booleans and numbers as strings

name.description: Name is the name of the helm parameter

value.description: Value is the value for the helm parameter

releaseName.description: The Helm release name. If omitted it will use the application name

valueFiles.description: ValuesFiles is a list of Helm value files to use when generating a template

values.description: Values is Helm values, typically defined as a block

environment.description: Environment is a ksonnet application environment name

parameters.description: Parameters are a list of ksonnet component parameter override values

items.description: KsonnetParameter is a ksonnet component parameter

namePrefix.description: NamePrefix is a prefix appended to resources for kustomize apps

nameSuffix.description: NameSuffix is a suffix appended to resources for kustomize apps

path.description: Path is a directory path within the Git repository

plugin.description: ConfigManagementPlugin holds config management plugin specific options

name.description: the name, usually uppercase

repoURL.description: RepoURL is the repository URL of the application manifests

targetRevision.description: TargetRevision defines the commit, tag, or branch in which to sync the application to. If omitted, will sync to HEAD

syncOptions.description: SyncOptions provide per-sync sync-options, e.g. Validate=false

syncStrategy.description: SyncStrategy describes how to perform the sync

apply.description: Apply wil perform a `kubectl apply` to perform the sync.

force.description: Force indicates whether or not to supply the --force flag to `kubectl apply`. The --force flag deletes and re-create the resource, when PATCH encounters conflict and has retried for 5 times.

hook.description: Hook will submit any referenced resources to perform the sync. This is the default strategy

force.description: Force indicates whether or not to supply the --force flag to `kubectl apply`. The --force flag deletes and re-create the resource, when PATCH encounters conflict and has retried for 5 times.

spec.description: ApplicationSpec represents desired application state. Contains link to repository with application definition and additional parameters link definition revision.

destination.description: Destination overrides the kubernetes server and namespace defined in the environment ksonnet app.yaml

name.description: Name of the destination cluster which can be used instead of server (url) field

namespace.description: Namespace overrides the environment namespace value in the ksonnet app.yaml

server.description: Server overrides the environment server value in the ksonnet app.yaml

ignoreDifferences.description: IgnoreDifferences controls resources fields which should be ignored during comparison

items.description: ResourceIgnoreDifferences contains resource filter and list of json paths which should be ignored during comparison with live state.

info.description: Infos contains a list of useful information (URLs, email addresses, and plain text) that relates to the application

project.description: Project is a application project name. Empty name means that application belongs to 'default' project.

revisionHistoryLimit.description: This limits this number of items kept in the apps revision history. This should only be changed in exceptional circumstances. Setting to zero will store no history. This will reduce storage used. Increasing will increase the space used to store the history, so we do not recommend increasing it. Default is 10.

source.description: Source is a reference to the location ksonnet application definition

chart.description: Chart is a Helm chart name

extVars.description: ExtVars is a list of Jsonnet External Variables

items.description: JsonnetVar is a jsonnet variable

tlas.description: TLAS is a list of Jsonnet Top-level Arguments

items.description: JsonnetVar is a jsonnet variable

value.description: Value is the value for the helm parameter

namePrefix.description: NamePrefix is a prefix appended to resources for kustomize apps

nameSuffix.description: NameSuffix is a suffix appended to resources for kustomize apps

path.description: Path is a directory path within the Git repository

plugin.description: ConfigManagementPlugin holds config management plugin specific options

name.description: the name, usually uppercase

repoURL.description: RepoURL is the repository URL of the application manifests

targetRevision.description: TargetRevision defines the commit, tag, or branch in which to sync the application to. If omitted, will sync to HEAD

syncPolicy.description: SyncPolicy controls when a sync will be performed

automated.description: Automated will keep an application synced to the target revision

prune.description: Prune will prune resources automatically as part of automated sync (default: false)

retry.description: Retry controls failed sync retry behavior

duration.description: Duration is the amount to back off. Default unit is seconds, but could also be a duration (e.g. "2m", "1h")

factor.description: Factor is a factor to multiply the base duration after each failed retry

maxDuration.description: MaxDuration is the maximum amount of time allowed for the backoff strategy

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of attempts when retrying a container

syncOptions.description: Options allow you to specify whole app sync-options

status.description: ApplicationStatus contains information about application sync, health status

items.description: ApplicationCondition contains details about current application condition

lastTransitionTime.description: LastTransitionTime is the time the condition was first observed.

message.description: Message contains human-readable message indicating details about condition

type.description: Type is an application condition type

history.description: RevisionHistories is a array of history, oldest first and newest last

items.description: RevisionHistory contains information relevant to an application deployment

deployStartedAt.description: DeployStartedAt holds the time the deployment started

deployedAt.description: DeployedAt holds the time the deployment completed

id.description: ID is an auto incrementing identifier of the RevisionHistory

revision.description: Revision holds the revision of the sync

source.description: ApplicationSource contains information about github repository, path within repository and target application environment.

chart.description: Chart is a Helm chart name

extVars.description: ExtVars is a list of Jsonnet External Variables

items.description: JsonnetVar is a jsonnet variable

tlas.description: TLAS is a list of Jsonnet Top-level Arguments

operationState.description: OperationState contains information about state of currently performing operation on application.

finishedAt.description: FinishedAt contains time of operation completion

message.description: Message hold any pertinent messages when attempting to perform operation (typically errors).

operation.description: Operation is the original requested operation

force.description: Force indicates whether or not to supply the --force flag to `kubectl apply`. The --force flag deletes and re-create the resource, when PATCH encounters conflict and has retried for 5 times.

phase.description: Phase is the current phase of the operation

retryCount.description: RetryCount contains time of operation retries

startedAt.description: StartedAt contains time of operation start

syncResult.description: SyncResult is the result of a Sync operation

resources.description: Resources holds the sync result of each individual resource

items.description: ResourceResult holds the operation result details of a specific resource

hookPhase.description: the state of any operation associated with this resource OR hook note: can contain values for non-hook resources

hookType.description: the type of the hook, empty for non-hook resources

message.description: message for the last sync OR operation

status.description: the final result of the sync, this is be empty if the resources is yet to be applied/pruned and is always zero-value for hooks

syncPhase.description: indicates the particular phase of the sync that this is for

revision.description: Revision holds the revision of the sync

source.description: Source records the application source information of the sync, used for comparing auto-sync
